replies.body: RIP Skittles 2009-2014
I would have rather his q stayed looking like skittles, only have them be random colors of the rainbow
Taste the Rainbow Karthus skin. Make it happen Rito.
So basically Arcade Karthus?

Q - Classic Blue/Green/red button from fighting games
W - Two classic arcade consoles with an 8-bit animated game between the two to act as a wall
E - A disco dance floor for the dancing arcade games of course
R - A claw from a claw machine that latches down and grabs the enemy and drags them up if killed

Riot Please

Yes.

Rito plz.

I'd pay a lot more for a Arcade {{champion:90}} .
Ult would just be vomiting rainbows on the enemy, maybe even having a jingle similar to Nyan Cat. And the voidlings could look like 8-bit space invaders.
{{champion:90}} vomits rainbows at me {{champion:41}} but I ate some oranges and it was k
Kog'maw could vomit rainbows too.  The void has so many rainbows in it.

although I almost never see Malzahar players-
THIS IS GENIUS AND IT SHOULD BE FUNDED IMMEDIATELY

I want a taste the rainbow zac skin too.

And Lux.
Can we just make Arcade EVERYTHING
What about an Arcade skin? Arcade Karthus, his ultimate would be a falling rainbow :D!
I wouldn't want to go to that end of the rainbow, the gold would all be near karthus
PentaRainbow all the way across the sky..

Alright the arcade skin would have the changing color lay waste, nyan cat flying across the 8-bit wall of pain, the 16-bit doom spell for requiem and 8-bit ghosties circling him on the ground surface for defile.
Even better, it would look like he's casting a 16-bit Doom spell.

In loving memory of the skittles we need Taste the Rainbow Karthus, Or Spaghetti and Meatballs Rumble.

Wow. This Champion Spotlight is kind of late isn't it? xD
    {{item:3070}} __ {{item:3070}} Anyway, R.I.P Red Laser Ulti
Why is there no Traditional skin for him, Sivir, Twitch or Nasus after their visual updates compared to Sejuani and Trundle?

Because he doesn't need one?  Because he wasn't a champion that got relaunched or something?  Same for Sivir and Twitch, they were just visupdated.  Though I do think that Nasus should have at least got some sort of option to retain his original VO lines, in memory of his previous voice actor having passed away some time ago. :\
Their looks didn't significantly change compared to Sejuani and especially Trundle.

Meanwhile The Sion champ spotlight is probably being held up for after the rework.
"Now, Sion has serious starting ad and is a Strong bruiser late game, so thats why you build him as a heavy AP midlaner."
I really want to see them fumble around to explain what he is. I bet it would be hilarious
Still waiting for that {{champion:44}}  Spotlight :(
Maybe he'll get the next VU so they can finally do a spotlight? Hmm...
I know right... it's about time the Gem Knight gets an update.
